nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope - The Official Collector's Edition

Star Wars A New Hope - The Official Collector's Edition was going to be a magazine to celebrate the 40th anniversary of the film. It was scheduled for release on July 25, 2017, but was canceled and replaced with the Star Wars A New Hope - Celebration Special Edition.

A behind-the-scenes souvenir special devoted to the first Star Wars movie. Featuring in-depth character profiles on Luke, Leia, Han, Chewie, Ben Kenobi, Darth Vader, and many more iconic characters from A New Hope!
